mapper.insert: insert into orders (ordercode, deptcode, userid, orderprice, orderlist, duedate, paymentduedate, specialnote, clientcode, status, sortation) values (#{ordercode},#{deptcode},#{userid},#{orderprice} ,#{orderlist},sysdate,sysdate,#{specialnote},#{clientcode} ,#{status},#{sortation})
mapper.select: select ordercode, deptcode, userid, orderprice, orderlist, duedate, paymentduedate, specialnote, clientcode, status, sortation from orders
select ordercode, deptcode, userid, orderprice, orderlist, duedate, paymentduedate, specialnote, clientcode, status, sortation from orders where ordercode = #{ordercode}
